dialogue.text: I'm going to take over the world with my\nsynthetic music!
Not if I stop you first!
You're just a boy, what could you\npossibly do to stop me? I'm the master of my craft!
I'm not just any boy, I'm the one who's going to save the world by rap battling you!
Ha! You think you can beat me in a rap battle? I'll destroy you!
We'll see about that. Prepare to be defeated!
